My Love

Always a light in my darkest days.

My heart beats to your gentle ways.

As endless as the boundless sea.

Precious soul, a melody that comforts me.

In every storm, I stand with you.

Every smile, a melody sweet.

Shining bright, the morning star in my sky

In your love, I’ve found my home.

Ever mine, my Precious treasure
